meanings.definition: The state of being divided or separated into parts.
meanings.sent1: The dividedness of the cake made it easy to share with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The dividedness of opinions on the topic led to a heated debate.
meanings.sent3: The dividedness of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: The dividedness of the river symbolized the cultural differences between the two towns.
meanings.sent5: The dividedness of the map highlighted the different regions of the country.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being divided or split.
meanings.sent1: The dividedness of the fabric made it difficult to mend.
meanings.sent2: The dividedness of the road caused traffic congestion.
meanings.sent3: The dividedness of the cookie jar tempted the hungry children.
meanings.sent4: The dividedness of the family heirlooms reflected the siblings' strained relationship.
meanings.sent5: The dividedness of the bookshelf showed the owner's eclectic taste in literature.

meanings.definition: The act or process of dividing or separating into parts.
meanings.sent1: The dividedness of the cells during mitosis is a fascinating biological process.
meanings.sent2: The dividedness of labor in the factory increased efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The dividedness of the ingredients in the recipe made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent4: The dividedness of the country into states allows for local governance.
meanings.sent5: The dividedness of the project into tasks helped the team stay organized.
